mapper.select: select order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rate from e3mall.tb_order where = #{}

select order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rate from e3mall.tb_order limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into e3mall.tb_order(order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rate) values (#{orderId}, #{payment}, #{paymentType}, #{postFee}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{paymentTime}, #{consignTime}, #{endTime}, #{closeTime}, #{shippingName}, #{shippingCode}, #{userId}, #{buyerMessage}, #{buyerNick}, #{buyerRate})

insert into e3mall.tb_order(order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rate) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.payment}, #{entity.paymentType}, #{entity.postFee}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.paymentTime}, #{entity.consignTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.closeTime}, #{entity.shippingName}, #{entity.shippingCode}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.buyerMessage}, #{entity.buyerNick}, #{entity.buyerRate})

insert into e3mall.tb_order(order_id, payment, payment_type, post_fee, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rate) values
(#{entity.orderId}, #{entity.payment}, #{entity.paymentType}, #{entity.postFee}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.paymentTime}, #{entity.consignTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.closeTime}, #{entity.shippingName}, #{entity.shippingCode}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.buyerMessage}, #{entity.buyerNick}, #{entity.buyerRate})
on duplicate key update order_id = values(order_id) , payment = values(payment) , payment_type = values(payment_type) , post_fee = values(post_fee) , status = values(status) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , payment_time = values(payment_time) , consign_time = values(consign_time) , end_time = values(end_time) , close_time = values(close_time) , shipping_name = values(shipping_name) , shipping_code = values(shipping_code) , user_id = values(user_id) , buyer_message = values(buyer_message) , buyer_nick = values(buyer_nick) , buyer_rate = values(buyer_rate)
mapper.update:
update e3mall.tb_order
order_id = #{orderId},
payment = #{payment},
payment_type = #{paymentType},
post_fee = #{postFee},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
payment_time = #{paymentTime},
consign_time = #{consignTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
close_time = #{closeTime},
shipping_name = #{shippingName},
shipping_code = #{shippingCode},
user_id = #{userId},
buyer_message = #{buyerMessage},
buyer_nick = #{buyerNick},
buyer_rate = #{buyerRate},
where = #{}
